author: Al Jazeera
title: Belarus holds referendum to renounce non-nuclear status
description: The referendum shedding Belarus’ neutral status comes as Russia put nuclear deterrent forces on high alert.
content:
Belarus is holding a referendum to adopt a new constitution that would ditch its non-nuclear status, at a time when the country has become a launchpad for Russian troops invading Ukraine.
